About Me

A few things about myself...

Short Bio

I am a recent graduate from Rutgers University and acquired a bachelors degree in computer science. I am now pursuing a full time position in software development specializing in android, java, python or front end development.

Android developer

I interned for a company named LiveCare that developed in making the smart Life Alert. Instead of having just one button on the device it had a screen where the user (usually an elderly) can check messages and make calls to the user of the LiveCare app. This device connects to the app on a smart phone where the members (usually the family members) can check on the device's user. I asissted the senior android developers in software testing and debugging for the app, contributed to the user interface. I mainly used Android Studio which uses Java as its programming language and XML to design the user interface.

IT Help Desk

I worked for my university's IT department for about a year. I mainly helped with troubleshooting for gaming consoles and computers.
